header-panel.info_1: Cheerful and calm, shy and inquisitive, fluffy and smooth,
header-panel.info_2: dogs and kitties - they all dream of a loving and caring owner :)

small-statistic.dateOfFounding: Year of foundation of our animal shelter
small-statistic.animalsFoundedHouse: The animals have found their new homes
small-statistic.animalsInWaiting: The animals are waiting for their owners

available-animals.about: Our pets need your help! You can make their life better. The shelter always needs food, leashes and collars, medicines, material and informational support. And also our dogs and cats need affection and communication with people, so we are always glad to have new volunteers
